LABEL: 0x48E
STRING: And so it was that Momotaro brought a strange girl along to his travels.

LABEL: 0x4C8
STRING: Congratulations...

LABEL: 0x4EE
STRING: Well, not quite.

LABEL: 0x508
STRING: After completing our search, the five of us, including Tokiwa, gathered again in the lobby on the second floor.

LABEL: 0x59C
STRING: 「...Hiragino-san, do you have anything to report?」

LABEL: 0x6CD
STRING: Hiragino's words were muddled.

LABEL: 0x6EB
STRING: Touri, who was standing beside him, also lowered her head.

LABEL: 0x711
STRING: Which meant...

LABEL: 0x80F
STRING: 「Are you sure you didn't miss anything?」

LABEL: 0x83E
STRING: Hiragino shook his head slightly.

LABEL: 0x866
STRING: So, there was no one else...

LABEL: 0x920
STRING: With that...

LABEL: 0x936
STRING: I turned my attention to the girl sitting beside Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x968
STRING: Touri was sitting down, looking even paler than before.

LABEL: 0x9A4
STRING: Was she feeling sick or something?

LABEL: 0x9DA
STRING: Or maybe...

LABEL: 0x9F4
STRING: I tried approaching her.

LABEL: 0xACB
STRING: I came to a stop, curious about what Yukari was doing.

LABEL: 0xAF9
STRING: She was muttering something while fiddling with the wristband on her right arm.

LABEL: 0xB64
STRING: 「...What is it?」

LABEL: 0xB85
STRING: As I stared at her, she asked me while not even looking at me.

LABEL: 0xBDF
STRING: "What," she asked? It was that thing on her arm.

LABEL: 0xC0F
STRING: 「What's that?」

LABEL: 0xCB0
STRING: 「Oh, this is POL.」

LABEL: 0xCD6
STRING: Yukari said and held her right hand to me.

LABEL: 0xD08
STRING: POL?

LABEL: 0xD1B
STRING: What was she talking about?

LABEL: 0xDB4
STRING: 「Huh? What do you mean? Isn't POL over there?」

LABEL: 0xDF1
STRING: Touri pointed toward one of the ship's microphones and gave voice to my own question.

LABEL: 0xEA9
STRING: After a moment's pause, Yukari seemed to understand what she was trying to say.

LABEL: 0xF76
STRING: 「The attendants can use this wristband to contact POL.」

LABEL: 0xFCA
STRING: So it was some kind of wearable device.

LABEL: 0x1000
STRING: I guess it was a privilege to be able to bring a thing like that with you here, but it didn't help in the slightest in our current situation.

LABEL: 0x10F4
STRING: 「POL, can you hear me? POL?」

LABEL: 0x1123
STRING: Yukari asked again in a slightly louder voice than before.

LABEL: 0x115F
STRING: But still, there was no response.

LABEL: 0x118B
STRING: Eventually, she let out a sigh as if she had given up.

LABEL: 0x1232
STRING: 「I thought the system would be back up and running automatically by now, but...」

LABEL: 0x12F6
STRING: 「If that's not yet the case, then what's left for us to do is...」

LABEL: 0x1366
STRING: Yukari's words trailed off.

LABEL: 0x1388
STRING: Hiragino kept quiet as well, with his arms folded.

LABEL: 0x13C0
STRING: Now that the search was over, what could we do next?

LABEL: 0x1498
STRING: It was Touri who broke the silence.

LABEL: 0x14C2
STRING: Her face had a grim expression as if she was in poor health.

LABEL: 0x14F4
STRING: Yukari had also noticed her unusual appearance.

LABEL: 0x15A3
STRING: 「Are you okay? You look kind of...」

LABEL: 0x16C5
STRING: Oh, I'm fine, I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0x16EE
STRING: Touri wiped her face and tried to smile.

LABEL: 0x172F
STRING: 「Umm, it's just that my sister...」

LABEL: 0x17CC
STRING: Her sister―Hikari.

LABEL: 0x17F4
STRING: She had looked frail in her white dress and had been enveloped in a fairytale-like aura.

LABEL: 0x1832
STRING: After all this time we'd spent searching, she was still nowhere to be found...

LABEL: 0x18F1
STRING: 「She forgot to take her medicine and went off on her own...」

LABEL: 0x193B
STRING: 「If she's not over here, then she must be...」

LABEL: 0x19AE
STRING: Everyone's eyes naturally turned toward the bridge.

LABEL: 0x19E0
STRING: The rear section was completely cut off from us.

LABEL: 0x1A12
STRING: It was a closed space we had no information about.

LABEL: 0x1A4E
STRING: She was right. There was still the rear section left...

LABEL: 0x1AF1
STRING: 「Now, now. Calm down. Maybe the other section will be fine as well.」

LABEL: 0x1B41
STRING: 「Yes, that's right. That's the feeling I'm getting.」

LABEL: 0x1B84
STRING: Tokiwa had been watching us in silence until now, like she was trying to dissolve into thin air, but had now decided to speak up.

LABEL: 0x1BE8
STRING: Was she trying to encourage Touri in her own way?

LABEL: 0x1CAE
STRING: 「That's right... Fortunately, the power system seems to be intact.」

LABEL: 0x1CEC
STRING: 「The automatic recovery system should be working, so we should be back in contact with the surface soon.」

LABEL: 0x1D4E
STRING: 「And as long as POL is restored, we should be fine, right?」

LABEL: 0x1E56
STRING: 「...Well, I guess. Rushing now will get us nowhere.」

LABEL: 0x1E9B
STRING: Hiragino, who was suddenly brought into the conversation, agreed with the two.

LABEL: 0x1ED1
STRING: ...We'd be back in contact with the surface soon, huh?

LABEL: 0x1F3F
STRING: It sounded a little too optimistic, but since we couldn't do anything about it, there was no point in worrying.

LABEL: 0x1F97
STRING: 「I guess we'll just have to wait and see...」

LABEL: 0x203A
STRING: 「Exactly, that's it! You're well informed, aren't you?」

LABEL: 0x2079
STRING: 「Uh, t-thanks...?」

LABEL: 0x2099
STRING: I was flustered by her reply to my monologue.

LABEL: 0x20CB
STRING: Tokiwa, however, let out a huff and let her gaze wander about.

LABEL: 0x211B
STRING: I couldn't get a read on what she was thinking...

LABEL: 0x220D
STRING: 「Okay. Well, while we're waiting, let's introduce ourselves to each other.」

LABEL: 0x22CE
STRING: 「Oh my, a heart-to-heart!」

LABEL: 0x22FC
STRING: 「Self-introductions are great.」

LABEL: 0x232B
STRING: Everyone raised their heads at his words.

LABEL: 0x2367
STRING: His voice sounded rather optimistic, but Yukari aimed a stern gaze at him.

LABEL: 0x242E
STRING: 「Self-introductions? Is this really the time for that?」

LABEL: 0x2472
STRING: 「I believe we have more pressing matters to attend to in this situation.」

LABEL: 0x253F
STRING: 「I told you we have to wait. Besides, there's nothing wrong with learning each other's names.」

LABEL: 0x25B0
STRING: Hiragino turned his body toward the three of us after deflecting Yukari's verbal attack.

LABEL: 0x268E
STRING: 「The name's Hiragino Sousuke. Despite my appearance, I'm this ship's doctor.」

LABEL: 0x26F3
STRING: He then opened his arms wide.

LABEL: 0x271F
STRING: ...True, without his rough-looking doctor's coat, he didn't look much like a doctor at all.

LABEL: 0x2790
STRING: 「My favorite thing, or hobby, is reading.」

LABEL: 0x27C0
STRING: 「And my dislikes are heights and... injections?」

LABEL: 0x27FD
STRING: ...Everyone seemed eager to let his idiotic introduction go by without saying anything.

LABEL: 0x2847
STRING: Besides, he didn't even list those xylitol tablets he still had in his hand as his favorite...

LABEL: 0x28BA
STRING: 「Nice to meet you all...

LABEL: 0x293E
STRING: Let's go clockwise, so you're next.」

LABEL: 0x29E8
STRING: At Hiragino's urging, Yukari turned to look at us, seemingly reluctant.

LABEL: 0x2AAF
STRING: 「...I'm Momoi Yukari. As you know, I'm the chief attendant of the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x2B1E
STRING: 「Pleased to make your acquaintance...」

LABEL: 0x2B47
STRING: She kept her introduction brief

LABEL: 0x2BB8
STRING: and made a slight bow.

LABEL: 0x2C6D
STRING: 「Hey!」

LABEL: 0x2C85
STRING: 「Give us a little more info.」

LABEL: 0x2CB8
STRING: Hiragino chewed on his tablet and jeered at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x2CEA
STRING: He must have been the type of student that the student council president would have hated...

LABEL: 0x2D32
STRING: And Yukari herself was the president type.

LABEL: 0x2DD5
STRING: 「I have nothing more to say.」

LABEL: 0x2E6C
STRING: 「Always so serious...」

LABEL: 0x2E97
STRING: 「Are you being sarcastic?」

LABEL: 0x2F2E
STRING: 「I'm just complimenting you.」

LABEL: 0x2F4E
STRING: ...Hey now, what was with this atmosphere?

LABEL: 0x2F7E
STRING: 「Now that the <SHEEP III> had sunk, it would've been a relief to know that the little crew that was left was reasonable and mature.」

LABEL: 0x2FFD
STRING: 「What was with the bickering?」

LABEL: 0x30F8
STRING: 「You're always like this, aren't you, Hiragino-sensei?!」

LABEL: 0x3134
STRING: 「Why do you keep making fun of me?」

LABEL: 0x3164
STRING: 「Is it because you're so tall?!」

LABEL: 0x3199
STRING: 「Height has nothing to do with it.」

LABEL: 0x323A
STRING: 「No, it does.」

LABEL: 0x32C8
STRING: 「Earlier, in the wheelhouse... you...

LABEL: 0x335A
STRING: Just what did you do to%Nme?!」

LABEL: 0x337A
STRING: 「Don't tell me you've forgotten!」

LABEL: 0x3421
STRING: 「That was an accident.」

LABEL: 0x34B5
STRING: 「Look, that sort of thing is――」

LABEL: 0x35B3
STRING: 「"That sort of thing?!"

LABEL: 0x361F
STRING: What do you mean, "that sort of%Nthing!?"」

LABEL: 0x364B
STRING: 「It's rude to be so dismissive as the offender!」

LABEL: 0x36EE
STRING: Why did our self-introductions turn to this?

LABEL: 0x3722
STRING: How old were you guys...?

LABEL: 0x3746
STRING: 「This is...」

LABEL: 0x37DD
STRING: 「It's getting a bit rowdy, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x382E
STRING: Rowdy, she said...

LABEL: 0x384C
STRING: Wasn't that a bit off the mark?

LABEL: 0x3956
STRING: 「"I'm afraid of dark places." You said that yourself.」

LABEL: 0x3A15
STRING: 「I did not!」

LABEL: 0x3A33
STRING: 「Was that supposed to be an imitation? It didn't even sound like me at all!」

LABEL: 0x3B0F
STRING: 「They're both so youthful... How nice.」

LABEL: 0x3B44
STRING: 「I'm not so sure about that...」

LABEL: 0x3BF5
STRING: 「Huh, you don't think so?」

LABEL: 0x3C28
STRING: 「Well... I wonder.」

LABEL: 0x3C4E
STRING: An adult man and woman being called youthful by a high school girl...

LABEL: 0x3CAF
STRING: Well, Yukari was one thing, I guess.

LABEL: 0x3D76
STRING: 「This is turning into a problem.」

LABEL: 0x3DA7
STRING: 「Gotcha.」

LABEL: 0x3DCA
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x3DEF
STRING: 「I'll do something about it.」

LABEL: 0x3E22
STRING: Tokiwa came forward suddenly.

LABEL: 0x3E52
STRING: This was bad. I shouldn't leave this to her.

LABEL: 0x3E84
STRING: That was what my gut feeling was telling me.

LABEL: 0x3FB9
STRING: But I had no basis for it.

LABEL: 0x3FDB
STRING: Maybe she could be of some help, after all...

LABEL: 0x40D1
STRING: 「Now, now, both of you!」

LABEL: 0x4103
STRING: Tokiwa cut between Hiragino and Yukari.

LABEL: 0x412F
STRING: The two adults looked at her in amazement due to her sudden interjection.

LABEL: 0x420E
STRING: 「Why are you making such a scene when the most beautiful girl in the world is about to introduce herself!」

LABEL: 0x4267
STRING: Damn...

LABEL: 0x4281
STRING: I should have known.

LABEL: 0x42A3
STRING: But she did manage to silence the two of them.

LABEL: 0x43A8
STRING: Both Hiragino and Yukari were too dumbfounded to say anything.

LABEL: 0x4477
STRING: 「...Phew!」

LABEL: 0x449A
STRING: Tokiwa then spun around with a smug look on her face.

LABEL: 0x45B7
STRING: 「Now then, please introduce yourself.」

LABEL: 0x46DF
STRING: You didn't mean yourself just now?!

LABEL: 0x4711
STRING: I almost blurted out without thinking.

LABEL: 0x473F
STRING: This kid was something else...

LABEL: 0x47F0
STRING: Touri, on the other hand, stood up and started her introduction.

LABEL: 0x4838
STRING: She was going with the flow a little too easily...

LABEL: 0x487B
STRING: 「My name is Nomura Touri. I'm a second-year high school student.」

LABEL: 0x48B7
STRING: 「I boarded the <SHEEP III> with my sister, but I don't know that much about the sea myself.」

LABEL: 0x497A
STRING: 「Also, I'm good at PE and modern literature. Pleased to meet you all!」

LABEL: 0x49C6
STRING: What a prim and proper introduction.

LABEL: 0x49F4
STRING: Tokiwa stepped forward as Touri bowed her head.

LABEL: 0x4AC6
STRING: 「My name is Saihouji Tokiwa, a genius physicist and an eternal beauty.」

LABEL: 0x4B22
STRING: 「I'd prefer if you called me Tokki, but anything's fine!」

LABEL: 0x4BDA
STRING: 「Any questions?」

LABEL: 0x4BFF
STRING: Erm...

LABEL: 0x4C17
STRING: There was a mountain of questions I wanted to ask.

LABEL: 0x4C45
STRING: 「...Why were you hiding in the library?」

LABEL: 0x4CFA
STRING: 「Mambo.」

LABEL: 0x4D1D
STRING: A simple answer, typical of the science types...

LABEL: 0x4D47
STRING: ...Still, that was way too simple!

LABEL: 0x4D83
STRING: 「A little more details...?」

LABEL: 0x4E32
STRING: 「Fine.」

LABEL: 0x4E50
STRING: 「When I came to, I was running out of the observation deck, attracted by the cuteness of a mambo swimming outside the window.」

LABEL: 0x4EBC
STRING: 「Then, some things happened, and I found myself in the library!」

LABEL: 0x4F46
STRING: What a brilliant explanation that told us nothing.

LABEL: 0x4F7A
STRING: But perhaps it was a mistake to assume there was a reason behind her actions.

LABEL: 0x4FD0
STRING: She just did what she wanted to, and either by chance or by accident, she ended up there...

LABEL: 0x5010
STRING: Maybe that was why she was called a genius...

LABEL: 0x50D5
STRING: 「From there on, it's simple.」

LABEL: 0x50F9
STRING: 「As the old saying goes, if you feel tremors, you should hide under a desk!」

LABEL: 0x51D9
STRING: 「So, I hid until help arrived.」

LABEL: 0x5205
STRING: 「That's what I was taught, so I hid.」

LABEL: 0x523E
STRING: 「I see... Thank you...」

LABEL: 0x529D
STRING: At any rate, talking to her burned a lot of calories...

LABEL: 0x52ED
STRING: Last but not least, it was my turn.

LABEL: 0x530F
STRING: Everyone's eyes were on me.

LABEL: 0x53FC
STRING: 「My name is...」

LABEL: 0x541C
STRING: 「...Katagiri Hitoha.」

LABEL: 0x544A
STRING: 「I was studying optimization algorithms in graduate school... and through that, I was able to help with the <SHEEP> project a little bit.」

LABEL: 0x54CF
STRING: 「I hope to get along with you all.」

LABEL: 0x54F5
STRING: I didn't think I needed to go into more detail here.

LABEL: 0x5521
STRING: It shouldn't be a big deal that a student was involved... That's what I hoped they were thinking.

LABEL: 0x5581
STRING: But if they asked, I did have an answer ready...

LABEL: 0x55CB
STRING: After bowing, I looked around at everyone's faces and saw no hints of suspicion, except...

LABEL: 0x5706
STRING: 「Katagiri... Hitoha...」

LABEL: 0x5728
STRING: 「A coincidence...? No, it can't be...」

LABEL: 0x576C
STRING: 「My name is...」

LABEL: 0x578C
STRING: 「...лл йй.」

LABEL: 0x57AE
STRING: 「I was studying optimization algorithms in graduate school... and through that, I was able to help with the <SHEEP> project a little bit.」

LABEL: 0x5833
STRING: 「I hope to get along with you all.」

LABEL: 0x5859
STRING: I didn't think I needed to go into more detail here.

LABEL: 0x5885
STRING: It shouldn't be a big deal that a student was involved... That's what I hoped they were thinking.

LABEL: 0x58E5
STRING: But if they asked, I did have an answer ready...

LABEL: 0x592F
STRING: After bowing, I looked around at everyone's faces and saw no hints of suspicion, except...

LABEL: 0x5A60
STRING: Only Yukari was giving me a stern look.

LABEL: 0x5AA2
STRING: Did she notice something...? No, I didn't reveal anything about myself.

LABEL: 0x5AFA
STRING: Was it just my imagination? Or...

LABEL: 0x5B93
STRING: Before I could assess the situation, she looked away.

LABEL: 0x5BD3
STRING: Instead, I met Touri's eyes, and she opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x5C8D
STRING: 「Hey, is that polite way of speaking a habit of yours?」

LABEL: 0x5CB4
STRING: 「Well, it might be.」

LABEL: 0x5CDA
STRING: 「It's just how I am... Is it strange?」

LABEL: 0x5D97
STRING: 「Not really, but... Hmm.」

LABEL: 0x5E97
STRING: 「To be honest, it's a bit strange. But I don't find it unpleasant.」

LABEL: 0x5ED8
STRING: I didn't want to hear that from her.

LABEL: 0x5EFE
STRING: I swallowed my words.

LABEL: 0x5FD6
STRING: After a round of self-introductions, all eyes were once again on Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x601A
STRING: He yawned and looked up toward the ceiling awkwardly.

LABEL: 0x60D7
STRING: 「...Is the automatic recovery supposed to take this long?」

LABEL: 0x612F
STRING: 「I don't see any signs of recovery at all...」

LABEL: 0x61E7
STRING: 「Signs... It's normal not to notice anything until the restoration is complete.」

LABEL: 0x629F
STRING: 「...But still, it's taking a long time.」

LABEL: 0x634D
STRING: 「We were told that if any of the servers went down, they would recover within 10 minutes.」

LABEL: 0x642E
STRING: 「10 minutes?」

LABEL: 0x644C
STRING: 「And how long has it been since the blackout started?」

LABEL: 0x6487
STRING: The tone of Hiragino's accusing voice made Yukari wince.

LABEL: 0x6543
STRING: 「T-The automatic recovery system covers all segments.」

LABEL: 0x6601
STRING: 「No matter what, the systems will recover.」

LABEL: 0x665A
STRING: Normally, that would be true.

LABEL: 0x6682
STRING: She was correct in theory, but...

LABEL: 0x66D1
STRING: 「That's not necessarily the case if the automatic recovery system itself malfunctions.」

LABEL: 0x6727
STRING: When I spoke up, she went silent.

LABEL: 0x67CE
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x67F5
STRING: 「It's the same as trying to grab your right hand with your right hand. It can't be done.」

LABEL: 0x6907
STRING: 「If the automatic recovery system is damaged, it can't recover itself...?」

LABEL: 0x6966
STRING: 「That's like the parricide paradox.」

LABEL: 0x699B
STRING: The two girls may or may not have understood what I was talking about.

LABEL: 0x69D7
STRING: As a programmer, I didn't understand how a sloppy design like that was allowed.

LABEL: 0x6A33
STRING: The person who left in a bug like that should be sacked immediately.

LABEL: 0x6AF5
STRING: Yukari was thinking about my words with a serious look on her face when she suddenly turned around.

LABEL: 0x6B79
STRING: 「I'll go and recheck the system status.」

LABEL: 0x6BBA
STRING: She tried to leave for the wheelhouse by herself.

LABEL: 0x6BE8
STRING: Hiragino called out to her back.

LABEL: 0x6C8D
STRING: 「Wait. I'm coming too.」

LABEL: 0x6D28
STRING: 「Please stay here, Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x6DD1
STRING: 「It's dangerous to move around on your own.」

LABEL: 0x6E0E
STRING: 「Even if you come with me, there's nothing for you to do.」

LABEL: 0x6E61
STRING: 「I'm not talking about that.」

LABEL: 0x6F12
STRING: 「I'm the chief officer of this submarine.」

LABEL: 0x6F44
STRING: 「I can't let outsiders enter the wheelhouse!」

LABEL: 0x6FFB
STRING: 「Can't you see that this is an emergency?!」

LABEL: 0x702B
STRING: 「This is no time for that!」

LABEL: 0x7060
STRING: Oh, come on. Not again.

LABEL: 0x707E
STRING: The two of them got more and more heated as we watched.

LABEL: 0x70AE
STRING: I know you were both upset about the situation, but now wasn't the time for fighting.

LABEL: 0x710E
STRING: Especially in front of the kids...

LABEL: 0x71C0
STRING: Touri was watching them with a smile on her face.

LABEL: 0x725E
STRING: Tokiwa was rolling up her sleeves.

LABEL: 0x7288
STRING: Was that really the proper reaction to the situation?

LABEL: 0x72F0
STRING: That aside... The wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x73E7
STRING: 「...Fine. But don't touch the equipment.」

LABEL: 0x7434
STRING: 「Please wait!」

LABEL: 0x7456
STRING: I shouted to Yukari's back, and she turned around to face me.

LABEL: 0x74A8
STRING: This was an opportunity I couldn't afford to miss.

LABEL: 0x7518
STRING: 「I was involved in the designing of the automated navigation system.」

LABEL: 0x7556
STRING: 「If I go with you to the wheelhouse, I might be of some help.」

LABEL: 0x75FC
STRING: I stared at her.

LABEL: 0x7626
STRING: It wasn't a lie that I was involved in the design process and that I might actually know something about it.

LABEL: 0x7682
STRING: It might even be possible for me to modify the automatic recovery system...

LABEL: 0x76C6
STRING: I looked straight into her doubt-filled eyes.

LABEL: 0x779D
STRING: 「...Very well.」

LABEL: 0x782B
STRING: 「лл-san, I'll allow you to come with us as well. Now――」

LABEL: 0x787D
STRING: 「Wait a minute.」

LABEL: 0x78A0
STRING: Yukari was getting fed up with being repeatedly interrupted.

LABEL: 0x78DE
STRING: I felt a bit sorry for her.

LABEL: 0x79C9
STRING: 「...What is it now?」

LABEL: 0x79FA
STRING: 「Are you going to leave these girls behind?」

LABEL: 0x7B0B
STRING: Hiragino looked to where Tokiwa and Touri were standing.

LABEL: 0x7B3D
STRING: The two of them looked at Yukari in unison―like puppies from a consumer credit commercial.

LABEL: 0x7C38
STRING: 「...Very well.」

LABEL: 0x7C5F
STRING: She let out a deep sigh.

LABEL: 0x7FD2
STRING: 「So this is what the wheelhouse is like...!」

LABEL: 0x7FFB
STRING: Touri shouted quietly, sounding impressed.

LABEL: 0x803B
STRING: She tried to keep her voice down but couldn't hide her amazement.

LABEL: 0x80AC
STRING: Her excitement was understandable.

LABEL: 0x80D2
STRING: The wheelhouse was, as the name suggested, a room that controlled the steering of the submarine.

LABEL: 0x8112
STRING: It was not a space that people could easily access.

LABEL: 0x8241
STRING: 「Don't touch anything, don't touch anything... Aaah...」

LABEL: 0x8283
STRING: Tokiwa couldn't control her curiosity and turned her head around wildly while whispering to herself.

LABEL: 0x82E7
STRING: Her behavior always seemed a bit odd, but in this case, it seemed rather normal.

LABEL: 0x835A
STRING: ...I guess that was a lot of insight for someone I'd known only for half a day.

LABEL: 0x8417
STRING: 「Ahem.」

LABEL: 0x8434
STRING: Yukari cleared her throat deliberately in front of us and our various reactions.

LABEL: 0x8503
STRING: 「This might be called the wheelhouse, but the <SHEEP III> was originally designed to sail autonomously.」

LABEL: 0x8560
STRING: 「It would do that with the aid of thoroughly pre-calculated navigation routes.」

LABEL: 0x8598
STRING: 「Things like the water currents, water pressure, water temperature, and obstacles are captured by an ultrasonic radar.」

LABEL: 0x85DC
STRING: 「The system monitors all of those variables and dynamically corrects the course in milliseconds.」

LABEL: 0x8645
STRING: 「Microseconds.」

LABEL: 0x86E0
STRING: 「...Right. But you don't have to correct me.」

LABEL: 0x872D
STRING: She threw me a glance as she said that.

LABEL: 0x875F
STRING: I just nodded my head in silence and let it go.

LABEL: 0x87C2
STRING: She must have some doubts about my identity and goals after all.

LABEL: 0x8822
STRING: Or maybe she wasn't sure what I was capable of or how much I knew.

LABEL: 0x88E9
STRING: 「...Hey. Hey!」

LABEL: 0x890C
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x8924
STRING: Suddenly, Touri called out to me.

LABEL: 0x8950
STRING: She whispered to me like she was worried about Yukari catching her as if she was talking in the middle of class.

LABEL: 0x89A7
STRING: 「This is the wheelhouse! Isn't it amazing?」

LABEL: 0x8A3F
STRING: 「It's the first time I've been to a place like this!」

LABEL: 0x8A74
STRING: 「I've never actually been inside one, either.」

LABEL: 0x8AA6
STRING: 「But I was involved with the creation of the control software on several occasions.」

LABEL: 0x8B84
STRING: She tilted her head but looked impressed nonetheless.

LABEL: 0x8BB8
STRING: As she said in her introduction, she didn't have much of a connection to the deep sea or submarines.

LABEL: 0x8C16
STRING: Did that mean the exchange in the observation deck before the accident wasn't a setup after all?

LABEL: 0x8D67
STRING: 「Hey, can you teach me how to use a PC sometime?」

LABEL: 0x8D98
STRING: 「A PC?」

LABEL: 0x8DC3
STRING: 「All those things are PCs, right? I'm not very good at using them.」

LABEL: 0x8E0D
STRING: I see. She was one of those people who thought that all computers were PCs.

LABEL: 0x8E5B
STRING: I didn't mean to make fun of her, but a slight smile still rose to my face.

LABEL: 0x8E9D
STRING: 「There are many people who can use a PC nowadays, so you don't need an expert like me to teach you, really.」

LABEL: 0x8F00
STRING: 「I guess that's true... Oh yeah, speaking of PCs...」

LABEL: 0x8FB9
STRING: Her previously bright face darkened abruptly.

LABEL: 0x8FEF
STRING: 「...What's the matter?」

LABEL: 0x9026
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x9042
STRING: 「My sister is good at those sorts of things.」

LABEL: 0x90A7
STRING: 「...Once you get the hang of it, anyone can do it.」

LABEL: 0x90E1
STRING: My words came out in desperation.

LABEL: 0x9173
STRING: Touri chuckled.

LABEL: 0x9210
STRING: 「Thanks! You're kind, just as I thought, лл-san.」

LABEL: 0x924E
STRING: 「Just as you thought?」

LABEL: 0x9279
STRING: 「You're so polite even to me, who's younger than you.」

LABEL: 0x92A3
STRING: 「Also, Tokiwa-san told me that you're kind and honest.」

LABEL: 0x92E2
STRING: 「You... think too highly of me.」

LABEL: 0x9312
STRING: Tokiwa told her that...?

LABEL: 0x9363
STRING: Well then...

LABEL: 0x9379
STRING: I cut the conversation there and looked down at the control panel before me.

LABEL: 0x93CF
STRING: I had finally arrived here after many twists and turns.

LABEL: 0x9405
STRING: I would do what I could... what I had to do.

LABEL: 0x944F
STRING: 「I'll be borrowing this, okay?」

LABEL: 0x947F
STRING: I sat down firmly in the chair in front of the control panel.

LABEL: 0x94BB
STRING: At the same time, I tried stroking panel as if to check it out.

LABEL: 0x9507
STRING: ...However, everything was completely lifeless. Not just the main display but also the sub-displays on the sides.

LABEL: 0x9580
STRING: 「See, everything is off.」

LABEL: 0x95B5
STRING: 「Did you check the main power?」

LABEL: 0x95EE
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x960B
STRING: ...Hey, hey, hey!

LABEL: 0x962F
STRING: She hadn't checked even that?

LABEL: 0x9655
STRING: 「The main power supply for these displays. Please check and make sure it's on.」

LABEL: 0x96D7
STRING: No reply... What was up with her?

LABEL: 0x96FD
STRING: I turned to ask her again.

LABEL: 0x978F
STRING: She was simply standing there, staring in wonder with a hint of red on her cheeks.

LABEL: 0x97DB
STRING: 「...Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x98C9
STRING: 「Huh? Oh... Right!」

LABEL: 0x991C
STRING: When I called out to her, she hurried off toward the wall.

LABEL: 0x996B
STRING: The LED on the display started to glow blue in response to the switch being turned on at the feet of the crouching Yukari.

LABEL: 0x99D7
STRING: 「I-It's on now.」

LABEL: 0x99FC
STRING: 「Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x9A14
STRING: It seemed that the interface had simply been turned off.

LABEL: 0x9A54
STRING: Most likely, it went down during the tremors.

LABEL: 0x9A8E
STRING: I'd like to think that she was on top of things like this, but for a chief, she wasn't very knowledgeable, was she?

LABEL: 0x9AE8
STRING: Now... Let's hope that it hasn't crashed.

LABEL: 0x9B24
STRING: As I thought that, my attention was drawn more and more to the devices in front of me.

LABEL: 0x9BD1
STRING: This was it.

LABEL: 0x9BF5
STRING: It had been many years since I'd been to an IT laboratory, but these things still excited me.

LABEL: 0x9CAD
STRING: Several icons lit up on the control panel, and the displays turned on one after another.

LABEL: 0x9D6E
STRING: Good, the main computer wasn't dead.

LABEL: 0x9DA2
STRING: After a few seconds, I reached the authentication screen.

LABEL: 0x9DD4
STRING: The password was...

LABEL: 0x9DF6
STRING: ...I stopped typing and turned around to make eye contact with Yukari.

LABEL: 0x9ECF
STRING: 「...What is it?」

LABEL: 0x9EF0
STRING: 「Could you enter your password?」

LABEL: 0x9FBC
STRING: She peeked in from under my right arm and entered the password.

LABEL: 0xA014
STRING: I waited with my elbow raised high, trying my best not to look at her while she was typing.

LABEL: 0xA0F3
STRING: 「It's authenticated.」

LABEL: 0xA13F
STRING: No biometrics scan...?

LABEL: 0xA163
STRING: All right!

LABEL: 0xA17B
STRING: With a light start-up sound, various data was displayed on the monitor in quick succession.

LABEL: 0xA1C3
STRING: I cracked my fingers.

LABEL: 0xA1ED
STRING: This is where it all begins...!

LABEL: 0xA211
STRING: It was possible to boot in safe mode, but it seemed that you had to adjust various settings after rebooting.

LABEL: 0xA269
STRING: Air conditioning, navigation, submarine lighting, and sensor management systems...

LABEL: 0xA2BF
STRING: I performed the system checks thoroughly.

LABEL: 0xA30A
STRING: 「How does it look?」

LABEL: 0xA337
STRING: 「I'm going through the calibrations, re-establishment of zero moment point and CPG, updates to the meta-motor cortex parameters...」

LABEL: 0xA3AF
STRING: 「...Feedforward control restart, transfer functions... and course deviation corrections.」

LABEL: 0xA40E
STRING: 「I... see.」

LABEL: 0xA42D
STRING: She nodded to herself unsurely.

LABEL: 0xA45B
STRING: She didn't seem to understand at all.

LABEL: 0xA4AC
STRING: A few minutes into the checks.

LABEL: 0xA4D0
STRING: I stopped tapping away at the keyboard and let out a long and heavy sigh.

LABEL: 0xA524
STRING: ...Fortunately, it seemed that there were no unforeseen problems.

LABEL: 0xA5D5
STRING: 「...What is it? Is there a problem?」

LABEL: 0xA60B
STRING: 「No... For now, I've got our location.」

LABEL: 0xA6C4
STRING: 「I-Is that so? That was pretty fast.」

LABEL: 0xA6FD
STRING: Yukari was somewhat taken back.

LABEL: 0xA756
STRING: Indeed, a quick glance at the clock showed that only a few minutes had passed since the start-up.

LABEL: 0xA79E
STRING: I wasn't a particularly fast worker, but I was respected by people outside my field.

LABEL: 0xA7F8
STRING: Well, it was all thanks to the system itself, which was largely intact.

LABEL: 0xA842
STRING: And next――

LABEL: 0xA858
STRING: 「I'll start a sonar survey.」

LABEL: 0xA87E
STRING: Sonar survey. Underwater, submarines sent out ultrasonic waves and received the reflected sounds in order to identify obstacles in the vicinity.

LABEL: 0xA8EC
STRING: The three-dimensional model of the <SHEEP III> appeared on the monitor, and the terrain around it was gradually displayed...

LABEL: 0xA953
STRING: Just as Yukari had said, the submarine had sunk.

LABEL: 0xA995
STRING: Fortunately, our landing was almost level, and there were a number of rocks around us.

LABEL: 0xA9FD
STRING: ...Strange.

LABEL: 0xAA19
STRING: I tapped on the keyboard to increase the range of the sonar search.

LABEL: 0xAA5F
STRING: But all I saw was the flat seabed and rocks.

LABEL: 0xAA9D
STRING: What I was looking for was――

LABEL: 0xAB4B
STRING: 「No! This can't be!」

LABEL: 0xAB79
STRING: I checked the location again.

LABEL: 0xABA1
STRING: Although there was a small margin of error, it shouldn't be that significant considering the point from which we had started the dive, and yet...

LABEL: 0xAC0F
STRING: I stared at the monitor.

LABEL: 0xAC2D
STRING: All I saw on the radar were rocks and stones...

LABEL: 0xAC6D
STRING: There was nothing there.

LABEL: 0xAC93
STRING: Something that should be there but was not...

LABEL: 0xADA8
STRING: 「лл-san!」

LABEL: 0xADD3
STRING: 「Are you all right?!」

LABEL: 0xADF6
STRING: Hiragino supported my shoulders while I stood there frozen after shouting.

LABEL: 0xAF0A
STRING: The three girls looked at me with concern after I stood up abruptly.

LABEL: 0xAF63
STRING: 「What's the matter? Is... something wrong?」

LABEL: 0xB04D
STRING: 「Hey, pull yourself together! Are you okay?」

LABEL: 0xB082
STRING: 「...Yeah, I'm fine...」

LABEL: 0xB0AC
STRING: I had to calm down... I returned to the control panel.

LABEL: 0xB1BF
STRING: 「What about contact with the surface?」

LABEL: 0xB1F4
STRING: 「...Unfortunately, all connections seem to have been severed.」

LABEL: 0xB232
STRING: I didn't even have to check.

LABEL: 0xB256
STRING: The recovery of communications was on a timer.

LABEL: 0xB286
STRING: When the time came, we would be able to communicate as we wanted. But until then, we couldn't do anything about it.

LABEL: 0xB3D0
STRING: 「...Does anyone have any communication devices?」

LABEL: 0xB412
STRING: 「You know, like a mobile phone, or a...」

LABEL: 0xB455
STRING: 「All devices that transmit or receive radio signals should've been collected at the port before boarding.」

LABEL: 0xB4AC
STRING: I thought back to the moment I'd gone through the gate.

LABEL: 0xB4EA
STRING: After a check that was several times stricter than on international flights, all of my electronic devices were confiscated.

LABEL: 0xB540
STRING: That had been very troublesome for me...

LABEL: 0xB605
STRING: 「You can't get a signal in the deep sea anyway.」

LABEL: 0xB639
STRING: 「The tools of earthly civilization are just an empty theory down here.」

LABEL: 0xB690
STRING: Tokiwa shared with us the bad news.

LABEL: 0xB6E5
STRING: 「...Don't worry. I'm sure that in due time...」

LABEL: 0xB71F
STRING: 「Now, let's continue working. Next is...」

LABEL: 0xB7C8
STRING: 「Hey, look...」

LABEL: 0xB7EB
STRING: She raised her small hand.

LABEL: 0xB80F
STRING: The monitor she was pointing at showed a detailed map of the interior of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xB873
STRING: 「...Is there something flashing on that map?」

LABEL: 0xB8D5
STRING: She pointed to a three-dimensional view of the rear section.

LABEL: 0xB909
STRING: If I zoomed in on the screen in front of me, most of it was flashing blue.

LABEL: 0xB957
STRING: Blue... Water?

LABEL: 0xB975
STRING: I turned back to Yukari.

LABEL: 0xBA64
STRING: 「Hey, are the people there alright?」

LABEL: 0xBAB6
STRING: Yukari stayed silent and averted her eyes.

LABEL: 0xBADE
STRING: I connected the dots in my mind that were forming an unpleasant image.

LABEL: 0xBB08
STRING: No way... No, that was...

LABEL: 0xBB68
STRING: I pulled up the detailed data on the monitor.

LABEL: 0xBB98
STRING: English letters filled the screen.

LABEL: 0xBBB8
STRING: And, what was written there was...

LABEL: 0xBC3B
STRING: 「...The rear section is

LABEL: 0xBC56
STRING: submerged...?」
